services.name: Property Listing Management Service
services.description: Enables real estate agencies to list, update, and delete property advertisements dynamically with support for high-resolution photo and document storage.

services.name: Market Analysis and Trends Service
services.description: Provides real-time insights into property price trends, neighborhood growth statistics, and market demand analysis for informed decision-making.

services.name: Tenant Screening and Verification Service
services.description: Supports landlords by offering identity verification, credit checks, and rental history reporting of prospective tenants.

services.name: Real Estate Legal Document Service
services.description: Offers templates and customizations for common real estate contracts and documents to streamline property transactions.

services.name: Property Maintenance and Service Scheduling API
services.description: Facilitates property managers in scheduling regular maintenance, tracking repairs, and managing service provider interactions efficiently.
